localize.text: Congrats for completing the Risk 16 Level Challenge of {0}
When attacking, if target has Suffocating Haze, deal +{0} damage. When hit, if attacker has Suffocating Haze, take {1} less damage.

Take {0} Damage and Stagger Damage at the End of the Scene and Subtract 1 stack If the character has both Corrasion and the difference between their stacks is less than {1}, he will take no Damage and Stagger Damage from them
